name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D新衣装お披露目】AZKi 5th Anniversary Live ＂with U -みんなと一緒にこれからも-＂【#AZKi5周年ライブ】 [7TtlKURvLDI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section after the song, introducing the guest Kazama Iroha.

subtitles.original: 無敵の笑顔で荒らすメディア
subtitles.english: Media stirred up by that invincible smile

subtitles.original: 知りたいその秘密ミステリアス
subtitles.english: Wanting to know those secrets, so mysterious

subtitles.original: 抜けてるとこさえ彼女のエリア
subtitles.english: Even her flaws are part of her charm

subtitles.original: 完璧で嘘つきな君は
subtitles.english: You, the perfect liar,

subtitles.original: 天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: Are a genius-like idol

subtitles.original: 「今日何食べた？」
subtitles.english: “What did you eat today?”

subtitles.original: 「好きな本は？」
subtitles.english: “What's your favorite book?”

subtitles.original: 「遊びに行くならどこに行くの？」
subtitles.english: “If you were to go out, where would you go?”

subtitles.original: 「何も食べてない」
subtitles.english: “I haven't eaten anything”

subtitles.original: 「それは内緒」
subtitles.english: “That's a secret”

subtitles.original: 何を聞かれてものらりくらり
subtitles.english: Dodging every question with ease

subtitles.original: そう淡々と
subtitles.english: So calmly,

subtitles.original: だけど燦々と
subtitles.english: But so brilliantly,

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない秘密は蜜の味
subtitles.english: The secrets that are almost visible taste like honey

subtitles.original: あれもないないない
subtitles.english: That's not it, no, no, no

subtitles.original: これもないないない
subtitles.english: This isn't it, no, no, no

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？相手は？さあ答えて
subtitles.english: What's your type? Is there someone? Come on, answer

subtitles.original: 「誰かを好きになることなんて私分からなくてさ」
subtitles.english: “I don't really know what it's like to fall in love with someone”

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ない
subtitles.english: Unable to tell if it's a lie or the truth,

subtitles.original: そんな言葉にまた一人堕ちる
subtitles.english: Another person falls for those words,

subtitles.original: また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: Making them fall in love again

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく
subtitles.english: Everyone is captivated by you,

subtitles.original: 君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: You are the perfect and ultimate idol

subtitles.original: 金利際現れない
subtitles.english: Never to appear again,

subtitles.original: 一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: The reincarnation of the brightest star

subtitles.original: ああ その笑顔で愛してるで
subtitles.english: Ah, with that smile and those “I love you”s,

subtitles.original: 誰も彼も虜にしていく
subtitles.english: You're enthralling everyone

subtitles.original: その瞳がその言葉が
subtitles.english: Those eyes, those words,

subtitles.original: 嘘でもそれは完全なアイ
subtitles.english: Even if they're lies, it's a perfect love

subtitles.original: はいはいあの娘は特別です
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that girl is special

subtitles.original: 我々は端からおまけです
subtitles.english: We've been just an extra from the start

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Bです
subtitles.english: We're just the supporting actor B to the star

subtitles.original: 全てがあの娘のおかげなわけない
subtitles.english: There's no way it's all thanks to her

subtitles.original: 洒落臭い 妬み嫉妬なんてないわけがない
subtitles.english: How annoying! There's no way there isn't envy and jealousy

subtitles.original: これはネタじゃないからこそ許せない
subtitles.english: This isn't a joke, which is why it's unforgivable

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃない君じゃ許せない
subtitles.english: If you're not perfect, it's unforgivable

subtitles.original: 自分も許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive myself either

subtitles.original: 誰よりも強い君以外は認めない
subtitles.english: I won't accept anyone but you, who are stronger than anyone

subtitles.original: 誰もが信じあがめてる
subtitles.english: Everyone believes and worships you,

subtitles.original: まさに最強で無敵のアイドル
subtitles.english: Truly the strongest and invincible idol

subtitles.original: 弱点なんて見当たらない
subtitles.english: No weaknesses can be found,

subtitles.original: 一番星を宿している
subtitles.english: Housing the brightest star within you

subtitles.original: 弱いとこなんて見せちゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: You must never show any weaknesses, no, no

subtitles.original: 知りたくないとこは見せずに
subtitles.english: Without showing the parts people don't want to know,

subtitles.original: 唯一無二じゃなくちゃイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: You have to be one of a kind, or it's a no, no

subtitles.original: それこそ本物のアイ
subtitles.english: That's exactly what true love is

subtitles.original: 得意の笑顔で沸かすメディア
subtitles.english: Warming up the media with your signature smile,

subtitles.original: 隠し通すこの秘密だけは
subtitles.english: Hiding away only this secret,

subtitles.original: 「愛してる」って嘘で積むキャリア
subtitles.english: Building a career on the lie of “I love you”s,

subtitles.original: これこそ私なりの愛
subtitles.english: This is my own kind of love

subtitles.original: 流れる汗も綺麗なアクア
subtitles.english: Even the trickling sweat is beautiful aqua,

subtitles.original: ルビーを隠したこの瞼
subtitles.english: These eyelids that hide rubies,

subtitles.original: 歌い踊り舞う私はマリア
subtitles.english: Singing and dancing, I am Maria,

subtitles.original: そう嘘はとびきりの愛だ
subtitles.english: Yes, lies are the ultimate love

subtitles.original: 誰かに愛されたことも
subtitles.english: I've never been loved by anyone,

subtitles.original: 誰かのこと愛したこともない
subtitles.english: And I've never loved anyone either

subtitles.original: そんな私の嘘がいつか本当になること信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe that my lies will one day become the truth

subtitles.original: いつかきっと全部手に入れる
subtitles.english: One day, I'll surely get everything,

subtitles.original: 私はそう欲張りなアイドル
subtitles.english: Yes, I'm a greedy idol

subtitles.original: 等身大でみんなのこと
subtitles.english: In my own way, about everyone,

subtitles.original: ちゃんと愛したいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to love you properly,

subtitles.original: 今日も嘘をつくの
subtitles.english: I'll tell lies again today

subtitles.original: この言葉がいつか本当になる日を願って
subtitles.english: Wishing for the day these words will one day become the truth

subtitles.original: それでもまだ君と君にだけは言えずにいたけど
subtitles.english: Even so, I still haven't been able to say it only to you and you,

subtitles.original: あやっと言えた
subtitles.english: Ah, I finally said it

subtitles.original: これは絶対嘘じゃない愛してる
subtitles.english: This is definitely not a lie, I love you

subtitles.original: うわぁー！
subtitles.english: Waaah!

subtitles.original: あずきち、5周年、おめでとうでござる！
subtitles.english: AZKi-chi, 5th anniversary, congratulations de gozaru!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ということでゲストにいろはちゃん来てもらいました！
subtitles.english: So, our guest, Iroha-chan is here!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！お邪魔するでござるー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you for having me de gozaru!

subtitles.original: いやー、今日は来てくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Man, thank you for coming today.

subtitles.original: いえいえ、こうやってまた一緒にね、歌って踊れて嬉しいでござるな。
subtitles.english: No, no. I'm so happy we could sing and dance together like this again.

subtitles.original: ねー、いつもは風真の記念配信に来ていただくことが多いんですけど、
subtitles.english: Right? Usually, you come to my anniversary streams a lot, but...

subtitles.original: 今日はね、あずきの5周年にいろはちゃんをお呼びいたしました！
subtitles.english: ...today, I invited Iroha-chan to my 5th anniversary!

subtitles.original: お邪魔しちゃいましたよ。呼んでもらえてすごい嬉しいでござる！
subtitles.english: I'm crashing the party! I'm so happy you invited me!

subtitles.original: いやもう、このあずきの5周年にはいろはちゃんがいないと...
subtitles.english: I mean, AZKi's 5th anniversary wouldn't be complete without Iroha-chan...

subtitles.original: あ、そんな！始まらないなって。
subtitles.english: Oh, stop it! ...it wouldn't even start.

subtitles.original: そんなこと言っていただきよろしいんですか？
subtitles.english: Is it really okay for you to say that?

subtitles.original: 本当ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Really, thank you.

subtitles.original: ということで「あずいろ」今年も色々ありましたね。
subtitles.english: So, a lot has happened for "Azuiro" this year, hasn't it?

subtitles.original: 本当になんか結構一緒にいた時間が長い気がするんでござるよな。
subtitles.english: I really feel like we've spent quite a lot of time together.

subtitles.original: なんとですね、
subtitles.english: Actually,

subtitles.original: 「あずいろ」が結成したのは、
subtitles.english: "Azuiro" was formed on...

subtitles.original: 2022年9月17日ということで、「あずいろ」結成1周年経っておりました！
subtitles.english: ...September 17, 2022. So it's been one year since Azuiro's formation!
